data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carvalho, Thiago Ribeiro De, Giaretta, Ariovaldo Antonio (2013): Taxonomic circumscription of Adenomera martinezi (Bokermann, 1956) (Anura: Leptodactylidae: Leptodactylinae) with the recognition of a new cryptic taxon through a bioacoustic approach. Zootaxa 3701 (2): 207-237, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3701.2.5
